fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport
eu_initiatives: Animals health, animal welfare and trade, biocides regulation, wildlife trafficking
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
PRODAF is the French Pet Industry association. 
With over 200 members (manufacturers, retailers, breeders, training centers) PRODAF is a unique representative force in France of all the different sectors of the pet industry. 
 
In line with regulatory requirements and Animal welfare, PRODAF draws up proposals and takes concrete actions to contribute to the responsible development of the sector. 
 
Our main goal is to promote and represent the profession among the French regulatory authorities and to support our members in applying regulatory and quality requirements.
